text: In geography, a plain is a large area of land with no hills or mountains. Plains mostly are more suitable for farming than plateaus or mountains. List of famous plains: * Canterbury Plains, New Zealand * Gangetic Plains of India, Bangladesh, North India,Nepal * Great Plains, United States * Indus Valley Plain, Pakistan * Kant≈ç Plain, Japan * Nullarbor Plain, Australia * Khuzestan Plain, Iran * Mazandaran Plain, Iran * Pannonian Plain, Central Europe * Salisbury Plain, England ==Related pages== * Landform * Floodplain * Grassland * Meadow * Pasture * Plateau * Prairie * Rangeland * Savanna * Steppe
title: Plain
